name: MyMailert
0:
”Alexa, open My Mailert”
”Alexa, launch My Mailert”
”Alexa, run My Mailert”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my mailert
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Just ask Alexa when your mailbox (physical mailbox) was last opened by saying "Alexa, open My Mailert."
Alexa will tell you exactly when it was last opened, including date and time.
You can also receive a text to your phone with the same information.
Get a Mailert device at http://mymailert.com
*Mailert LTE device is needed
